author: hwright
msg: (svn_wc__load_props): Remove another entry fetch in favor of read_info().

author: hwright
msg: Remove an entry fetch in place of using svn_wc__db_read_info().
[ Note: This is the first of several (many?) commits to do similar work
within props.c.  I don't mean to spam svn@, but I'd like to be able to
write and test each of these bits independently. ]

author: hwright
msg: Include the property reject file name as part of the information returned from
(read_entries_new): Read the property rejection filename through the
read_info() interface, instead of directly from the actual node.
(statements): Select the property reject file from the ACTUAL table.
(svn_wc__db_read_info): Add an argument for the property reject file,

author: hwright
msg: Convert libsvn_client's relocate function to use the updated libsvn_wc API.
This removes the use of more access baton cruft in favor of a working copy
(svn_client_relocate): Call svn_wc_relocate4() in place of svn_wc_relocate3(),
and use a context in place of an adm_access baton.
